org.concordion.api

Interface SpecificationByExample

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Specification
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SpecificationToSpecificationByExampleAdaptor, XMLSpecification

    public interface SpecificationByExample
extends Specification
    Extension interface for Specifications that contain Concordion examples.
    Since:
    2.0.0

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void finish()
      Called once all examples have been executed so the spec can do things like "save HTML results to file".
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getExampleNames()
      Gets all the examples in the specification.
      boolean hasExampleCommandNodes()
      Returns whether the specification contains example nodes.
      void processExample(Evaluator evaluator, java.lang.String example, ResultRecorder resultRecorder)
      Processes a single example.
      void setFixture(Fixture fixture)
      Sets the fixture.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.concordion.api.Specification

        process

    • Method Detail

      • setFixture

        void setFixture(Fixture fixture)
        Sets the fixture. Will be called before the other methods are called so that the class can process the fixture to determine examples, etc.
        Parameters:
        fixture - the fixture instance

      • hasExampleCommandNodes

        boolean hasExampleCommandNodes()
        Returns whether the specification contains example nodes.
        Returns:
        true if specification has one or more nodes with an example command on

      • getExampleNames

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getExampleNames()
        Gets all the examples in the specification.
        Returns:
        names of the examples

      • processExample

        void processExample(Evaluator evaluator,
                  java.lang.String example,
                  ResultRecorder resultRecorder)
        Processes a single example.
        Parameters:
        evaluator - evaluator
        example - name of the example
        resultRecorder - result recorder

      • finish

        void finish()
        Called once all examples have been executed so the spec can do things like "save HTML results to file".
